author: Alex C

review: Overall, I'm pretty impressed with the Fire Stick.  The remote is great and the browsing experience is pretty good.  App selection is pretty good and loading apps is really easy.The only problems that I have had are the occasional audio glitch during playback and that the Fire Stick sometimes loses or forgets the wireless connection/password when waking from sleep mode.  The wireless problem is really annoying when it happens (3 times in the first week of use), and is the reason I knocked the rating down. Hopefully, both of these issues can be fixed in a future software update.The one feature that I really find myself missing is the screencasting ability.  Hopefully, this is a feature that will be released in the future.Overall, I'm really happy with the Fire Stick so far, and would definitely recommend it for anyone looking for a good, cost effective solution for streaming.
